text: Léon is a city in the Mexican state of Guanajuato. About 1,150,000 people live in Léon. This makes it the seventh largest city in Mexico and the largest city in Guanajuato. == References == Category:Cities in Mexico Category:Settlements in Guanajuato (state) Category:1576 establishments Category:16th-century establishments in Mexico Category:1570s establishments in North America Category:Municipality seats in Guanajuato (state)
title: León, Guanajuato
